benefitsDerivedAndShared.subject: GX.benefitsDerivedAndShared
benefitsDerivedAndShared.description: What monetary or non-monetary benefits arised from the project and how they were shared. (Related to the monitoring of the utilisation of genetic resources and Nagoya compliance).
benefitsDerivedAndShared.title: Benefits derived and shared

datasetName.subject: GX.datasetName
datasetName.description: Name of the dataset. This must be unique.
datasetName.title: Name

datasetType.subject: GX.datasetType
datasetType.description: Type of the dataset. Usually basic, project type is generally used only to give information on project Nagoya compliance.
datasetType.title: Dataset type

description.subject: GX.description
description.description: Description of the tag, so that other people understand what it is about.
description.title: Description

researchCollaborator.subject: GX.researchCollaborator
researchCollaborator.description: Institutions or persons collaborating in the project.
researchCollaborator.title: Research collaborator(s)

researchFundingDuration.subject: GX.researchFundingDuration
researchFundingDuration.description: Duration of the project funding (dates from and to). (related to the monitoring of the utilisation of genetic resources and Nagoya compliance).
researchFundingDuration.title: Research funding duration

researchFundingRecipient.subject: GX.researchFundingRecipient
researchFundingRecipient.description: Which person or institution received the project funding (related to the monitoring of the utilisation of genetic resources and Nagoya compliance).
researchFundingRecipient.title: Research funding recipient

researchFundingSource.subject: GX.researchFundingSource
researchFundingSource.description: Who funded the project (related to the monitoring of the utilisation of genetic resources and Nagoya compliance).
researchFundingSource.title: Research funding source

owner.subject: MZ.owner
owner.description: Team or organisation that owns the record and can edit it.
owner.title: Owner of record
